description: Row sums of Fibonacci-Pascal triangle in A045995.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
R. Whitney, Problem H-254, Fib. Quart., 13 (1975), p. 281.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..14
prog: (PARI) a(n) = sum(k=0, n, fibonacci(binomial(n, k))) \\ _Michel Marcus_, May 25 2013(Haskell)a006449 = sum . a045995_row  -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, May 20 2014
author: _Jeffrey Shallit_, Nov 25 1975
